target_phrases.danish: Jeg skriver den lige i min telefon
target_phrases.english: I'll just write it in my phone

target_phrases.danish: Vil du sende den til mig?
target_phrases.english: Will you send it to me?

target_phrases.danish: Det kan jeg desværre ikke huske
Jeg har den hjemme på min computer
target_phrases.english: I have it at home on my computer

target_phrases.danish: Må jeg også få dit mobilnummer?
target_phrases.english: Can I also have your mobile number?

target_phrases.danish: Jeg skriver til dig i aften

output:
order_id,language,voice_id,text,delay,repeat
1,en,en_f_voice,"Scenario 1 - Business Networking: You're at a conference and want to stay in touch with a potential collaborator. Start by asking for their email.",4000,1
2,en,en_f_voice,"Great, go ahead and ask for their email address",3000,1
3,da,da_f_voice,"Ja, selvfølgelig. Jeg skriver den lige i min telefon.",2000,1
4,da,da_f_voice,"Marie.Hansen@firma.dk",2000,1
5,en,en_f_voice,"Perfect! Now ask if you can have their mobile number too",3000,1
6,da,da_f_voice,"Ja, det er 45 12 34 56",2000,1
7,en,en_f_voice,"Excellent! Tell them you'll write to them tonight",3000,1
8,da,da_f_voice,"Det lyder godt!",2000,1
9,en,en_f_voice,"Scenario 2 - New Workplace: A colleague wants to add you to a project group chat. Listen and respond naturally.",4000,1
10,da,da_m_voice,"Vil du have min e-mail?",2000,1
11,en,en_f_voice,"Nice! Tell them you'll write it in your phone",3000,1
12,da,da_m_voice,"Det er Anders.P@work.dk",2000,1
13,da,da_m_voice,"Må jeg også få dit mobilnummer?",2000,1
14,en,en_f_voice,"Perfect moment to say you'll send it tonight",3000,1
15,da,da_m_voice,"Tak for hjælpen!",2000,1
16,en,en_f_voice,"Scenario 3 - Study Group: You need Eva's email for the presentation next week.",4000,1
17,da,da_f_voice,"Hej! Hvad kan jeg hjælpe med?",2000,1
18,en,en_f_voice,"Good time to ask about Eva's email",3000,1
19,da,da_f_voice,"Det kan jeg desværre ikke huske.",2000,1
20,da,da_f_voice,"Jeg har den hjemme på min computer.",2000,1
21,en,en_f_voice,"Perfect! Ask if they can send it to you",3000,1
22,da,da_f_voice,"Ja, selvfølgelig. Jeg skriver til dig i aften.",2000,1
23,en,en_f_voice,"Wonderful - thank them for their help",3000,1
24,da,da_m_voice,"Det var så lidt!",2000,1
25,en,en_f_voice,"Scenario 4 - Language Exchange: You're finishing up a great Danish practice session.",4000,1
26,da,da_f_voice,"Det har været hyggeligt at tale dansk sammen.",2000,1
27,da,da_f_voice,"Vil du have min e-mail?",2000,1
28,en,en_f_voice,"Great! Say yes and offer to write it in your phone",3000,1
29,da,da_f_voice,"Louise.M@dansk.dk",2000,1
30,da,da_f_voice,"Må jeg også få dit mobilnummer?",2000,1
31,en,en_f_voice,"Fantastic - tell them you'll send it tonight",3000,1
32,da,da_f_voice,"Vi ses næste uge!",2000,1
33,en,en_f_voice,"Scenario 5 - Workshop Planning: You need the instructor's contact details.",4000,1
34,da,da_m_voice,"Hej! Du leder efter Sofie?",2000,1
35,en,en_f_voice,"Yes! Ask politely for her email address",3000,1
36,da,da_m_voice,"Jeg har hendes kontaktinformation.",2000,1
37,da,da_m_voice,"Vil du have den?",2000,1
38,en,en_f_voice,"Perfect timing to ask them to send it to you",3000,1
39,da,da_m_voice,"Jeg skriver til dig i aften med det hele.",2000,1
40,en,en_f_voice,"Excellent - finish by thanking them warmly",3000,1
41,da,da_m_voice,"Det var så lidt!",2000,1
